mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectClmWrhsCpstGodCnnc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CLM_NO , CLM_WRHS_GOD_TURN , CLM_WRHS_CPST_GOD_TURN , PCKAGE_GOD_TP_CD , CPST_GOD_QTY , SORT_SEQ , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CLM_WRHS_CPST_GOD_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND CLM_NO = #{clmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CLM_WRHS_GOD_TURN = #{clmWrhsGodTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CLM_WRHS_CPST_GOD_TURN = #{clmWrhsCpstGodTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
